price: 198. Haddaan ku soo dejin laheyn (Qur’aankani) cajamiga midkood13.
footnotes: 13. Macnaha waa aan ku soo dejin lahayn Qur’aanka cid kale aan Carab ahayn, ama si fiican u aqoon afka Carabiga oo aan faseex ahayn.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
